content.text: Eventus Law Limited is required to obtain an understanding of a client’s overall source of wealth as part of its anti-money laundering obligations.
This request relates to the client’s background and financial profile, not to any specific transaction.
The extent of information required is risk-based and proportionate.

fields.label: Matter reference (if matter has already been opened)

label.value: What is the client's primary source(s) of wealth?
options: Ownership of shares in company / companies
Sale of business or business assets
(For corporate entities) capital injection / loans from owners / shareholders

fields.label: Please briefly explain how and over what period the above wealth was accumulated?
In which countries has the client primarily earned their income / accumulated their wealth
Is any material part of the client’s wealth connected with a FATF-listed High-Risk Third Country?

content.text: Any requirement for supporting information or escalation will be generated by the Eventus AML Compliance Assistant based on this record and the client and matter level risk assessment outputs.
